Burkina Faso detains four French civil servants, says diplomatic sourceFour French IT workers with diplomatic passports and visas have been arrested in Burkina Faso's capital, Ouagadougou, a French diplomatic source said on Wednesday, denying a media report that they were intelligence agents. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:27:52 GMT WQY6AJSKSFLWZBGWCG7JR6TVHA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/burkina-faso-detains-four-french-civil-servants-says-diplomatic-source-2023-12-20/Reuters世界非洲
Riyadh reluctant to derail Iran detente over U.S. Red Sea taskforceSaudi Arabia's name was conspicuously - perhaps surprisingly - absent from a list of countries the United States announced as part of its new naval coalition protecting Red Sea shipping from Yemen's Houthi group. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 19:11:18 GMT 3LVCXRWKQFN4JIIZ7Z7USAXBCI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/riyadh-reluctant-derail-iran-detente-over-us-red-sea-taskforce-2023-12-20/Alexander Cornwell, Pesha Magid世界中东
Main elements of fiscal reforms agreed by EU governmentsEuropean Union finance ministers agreed on Wednesday changes to the EU's fiscal rules updating them to the post-pandemic realities of high public debt and the need for massive public investment to fight climate change. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 18:33:32 GMT YXBM5QYMWNLFZJYC4WGQQFP3U4 https://www.reuters.com/markets/europe/main-elements-fiscal-reforms-agreed-by-eu-governments-2023-12-20/Jan Strupczewski市场欧洲市场
Tunnels from Hamas leaders' homes found under Gaza City, Israel military saysIsraeli forces uncovered a network of tunnels running deep beneath central Gaza City from properties registered to Yahya Sinwar and other senior Hamas organizers of the Oct. 7 attacks on Israel, the military said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 18:21:27 GMT KOCBM2HJNJKKPBAG3LPEMQJUUE https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/tunnels-hamas-leaders-homes-found-under-gaza-city-israel-military-says-2023-12-20/Reuters世界中东
Blinken says US wants Israel to shift to targeted operations in Gaza focusing on Hamas leadershipThe U.S. wants and expects Israel to shift its military operations in Gaza to a lower-intensity phase during which there will be more targeted operations focused on the Hamas leadership and its infrastructure, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 18:11:25 GMT CRPWN6C5BZML3GL6O3FL6A5QBI https://www.reuters.com/world/blinken-says-us-wants-israel-shift-targeted-operations-gaza-focusing-hamas-2023-12-20/Humeyra Pamuk, Jonathan Landay世界
Hezbollah pays growing price in Mideast conflictHezbollah is paying a growing price in weeks of hostilities with Israel that have killed more than 100 of its fighters, but does not foresee all-out war even as the toll increases and the conflict grinds on, sources familiar with its thinking say. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 17:42:45 GMT NZVM7J2T6ZM3JISNZD7RC42EAM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hezbollah-pays-forming-price-mideast-conflict-2023-12-20/Laila Bassam, Jihed Abidellaoui世界中东
UN vote on Gaza aid delayed until Thursday as US talks to EgyptA United Nations Security Council vote on a bid to boost aid to the Gaza Strip has been delayed by another day, hinging on last-minute negotiations between the U.S. and Egypt over a proposal for U.N. aid monitoring as Washington seeks to avoid using its veto power, diplomats said on Wednesday. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 17:41:14 GMT PRQKWMS2BROJ3KQVXXNZX3ZSOE https://www.reuters.com/world/un-vote-gaza-aid-further-delayed-us-works-intensely-2023-12-20/Michelle Nichols世界
Irish prime minister confident Northern Ireland deal within reachIrish Prime Minister Leo Varadkar expressed confidence on Wednesday that Northern Ireland's power-sharing government would be restored in the new year and that reforms on its operation could be up for discussion after that. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 17:40:28 GMT FSDKL26TMJLP7PS37Y67H76YL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/irish-prime-minister-confident-northern-ireland-deal-within-reach-2023-12-20/Reuters世界英国
British teenagers convicted of 'ferocious' murder of transgender girlTwo British teenagers were found guilty on Wednesday of killing 16-year-old transgender girl Brianna Ghey in a "ferocious attack" in a park in northwest England earlier this year. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 17:29:10 GMT MDQ5433JUNNZHPDKBGFWGS5IBU https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/british-teenagers-convicted-ferocious-murder-transgender-girl-2023-12-20/Reuters世界英国
Ukrainian army proposal to call up more civilians gets mixed reaction in KyivA Ukrainian army proposal to conscript up to 500,000 more civilians has produced mixed feelings in Kyiv, with many people saying more troops are needed to fight Russia but some suggesting it is pointless unless they get more weapons. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 16:08:52 GMT 7KTFRT76G5IKLDKOCDZPR2QZG4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-army-proposal-call-up-more-civilians-gets-mixed-reaction-kyiv-2023-12-20/Ivan Lyubysh-Kirdey世界欧洲
First protests in Argentina as groups react to Milei austerity planThousands of people took to the streets of Buenos Aires on Wednesday to protest against the government's economic shock measures, in the first real test for Argentina's new libertarian president, Javier Milei. Wed, 20 Dec 2023 15:50:07 GMT 4B4UYZFBXRPWDDJME2IU5Q42BM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/first-protests-expected-argentina-groups-react-milei-austerity-plan-2023-12-20/Reuters世界美洲
